name: SpinalVascularMalformationsAndOrTheCauseOfOccultSubarachnoidHemorrhage
title: Spinal vascular malformations and/or the cause of occult subarachnoid hemorrhage
description: OP-8 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with spinal vascular malformations.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of the data is to identify patients with spinal vascular malformations.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with spinal vascular malformations are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not associated with spinal vascular malformations are excluded from the value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-10 are also excluded from the value set)
